definition: elongate freshwater cod of northern Europe and Asia and North America having barbels around its mouth
details:
noun
- elongate freshwater cod of northern Europe and Asia and North America having barbels around its mouth
= synonyms: burbot
- American hakes
- elongated marine food fish of Greenland and northern Europe
- common Old World heath represented by many varieties
= synonyms: broom, heather
- water chestnut whose spiny fruit has two rather than 4 prongs
= synonyms: ling ko
